document_data.mainbody:
Ghosttalk was a spell that allowed a wizard and a target to remain in earshot no matter what.
After casting the spell on a target, all sounds that generated from the casters person (but not from implements they were wielding, or their surroundings) were repeated in the targets ear, and viceversa, for five minutes. Distance was no longer a factor, nor was background noise the two could hear each other no matter what.
A second casting allowed for five more minutes, but third castings did not work.
Just somatic components were required.
Azuth made this spell available through Elminster sometime prior to .
